ADAMIN 𒈓 Adamen = Leute² 𒇽𒇽 admin@Hindu “man” آدَم ʾādam, “Adam”

man = amdan @ Berber

Edom (/ˈiːdəm/;[1][2] Edomite: 𐤀𐤃𐤌 ’Edām; Hebrew: אֱדוֹם ʼÉḏōm, lit.: "red"; Akkadian: 𒌑𒁺𒈠𒀀𒀀 Uduma; Syriac: ܐܕܘܡ)

𒌑𒁺𒈠𒀀𒀀 Uduma ⇔ dum=son/adam

𓊃 𓈖 𓆑 𓅱 𓂐 δanu ⇔ dynastie damn dam=blood@SEM ⇔ Adam man
